Here's my **[[[greenwolf-s-author-page|Author Page]]]**.

This series has been in planning for over five years now, and is the penultimate culmination of plot threads that stretch back to before Third Law was even a canon. We're in the home stretch now folks. Soon all the years of writing and world-building will be paying Dividends.

[[div style="border: solid 5px #999999; background:#e0d8de; padding: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
**May 11th, 2008**
**[[[secure-facility-dossier-site-246|Site-246]]]**

**Director Westbrook**: Sir, you can't.
**O5-7**: It's too late. Events are already in motion.
**Director Westbrook**: There has to be another way.
**O5-7**: There was. There was your way. But you couldn't do it.
**Director Westbrook**: Sir?
**O5-7**: Don't sir me, Cody. I know what you did. I've always known.
**Director Westbrook**: How?
**O5-7**: It was obvious. You did the worst thing an intelligence agent can do: you became the mask. You fell in love with the mark. And what's worse is that I saw it and ignored it. All of this, the failure of Delta-3, the death of Agent Elsinger -- it's on our heads. And now someone is finally cleaning up our mess.
**Director Westbrook**: Sir, please, ask the council to give me another chance. I could--
**O5-7**: You could what? Fuck it up even more? No, Cody. You had your chance. This is how it has to be. I'm sorry.
[[/div]]
